ingredients.ingredient: 2 large russet potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes
1 (14 ounce) beef smoked sausage (such as Hillshire FarmsÂ®), cut into 1/2-inch slices

cookingTips: Cut potatoes into uniform cubes so they cook at the same rate
Brown potatoes in olive oil first to create a crispy exterior
Add cheddar cheese at the end off heat to prevent stringiness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user build a skillet dish with textural contrast by crisping potatoes, adding smoked sausage, and finishing with melted cheese.
